title: The Unwanted Affair
description: Chelsea has spent her lifetime giving to everyone else, never asking for anything for herself. When Marc, her best friend’s brother, confesses that he’s had feelings for her for a long time, she regretfully kisses him, never knowing that fateful moment would change her life in disturbing ways.Marc isn’t the kind of man who takes no for an answer. When he divulges his secret to Chelsea, he does so fully expecting that she’ll reciprocate his feelings, but when things don’t pan out as he planned, he turns into someone she doesn’t recognize.Reeling from her ordeal, Chelsea desperately wants to reach out to her friend and disclose the sordid details, but when tragedy strikes, she changes course. That decision, however, changes the course of her life. A new man walks into her life, but before she can move forward, she’s forced to make a difficult decision.Will it be the right one for her?
author: Jillian Behrz
